```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
```

```{r,read data}
airdata <- read_csv('data.csv') %>% 
  rename('activity' = '...1')

airdata %>% 
  ggplot(aes(RH,Rf))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(method=lm,se=FALSE)+
  facet_wrap(~activity)

lm1 <- lm(Rf ~ RH ,data=airdata)
summary(lm1)


```
